name: Stygian Depths
description:
Trapped in the uncharted depths of the ocean, a lone submersible pilot must face the terror of their own failing vehicle and an unseeable, unknowable evil to escape the crushing darkness.  

Watch the Gameplay Preview.

Stygian Depths is our first game as an official indie studio! The goal was to design a short, fun, and unique experience to start out with, before tackling more ambitious projects. In the future, we hope to return to Stygian Depths to flesh it out into a fully-realized psychological horror game.
